docs.snippet: President Donald Trump released an order Friday night banning most transgender troops from serving in the military except under "limited circumstances," following up on his calls last year to ban transgender individuals from serving.

headline.print_headline: Trump Order Would Ban Most Transgender Troops From Serving
headline.main: Trump Order Would Ban Most Transgender Troops From Serving

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump is planning to oust embattled Veterans Affairs Secretary David Shulkin amid an extraordinary rebellion at the agency and damaging government investigations into his alleged spending abuses, three administration officials tol...

headline.print_headline: AP Sources: Trump Plans to Oust Shulkin as VA Secretary
headline.main: AP Sources: Trump Plans to Oust Shulkin as VA Secretary

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump signed a memorandum on Friday that bans some transgender individuals from serving in the U.S. military, but gives the armed forces latitude in implementing policies.

headline.print_headline: Trump Moves to Limit Transgender Individuals From Military Service
headline.main: Trump Moves to Limit Transgender Individuals From Military Service

docs.snippet: Quotation of the Day for Monday, March 19. 2018.

headline.print_headline: Quotation of the Day: His Anger Rising, Trump Takes Aim at Mueller Team
headline.main: Quotation of the Day: His Anger Rising, Trump Takes Aim at Mueller Team

docs.snippet: Sitting in apartment complexes on opposite sides of town, the women — one a former shopkeeper from Somalia, the other a teacher from Bhutan — waited for children to come home.

headline.print_headline: Trump Policies Split Some Refugee Families; Others Reunite
headline.main: Trump Policies Split Some Refugee Families; Others Reunite

docs.snippet: Elliott Broidy, vice chairman of the Republican Party, exchanges threats with Qatar as a Persian Gulf cyber war echoes in Washington.

headline.print_headline: Fund-Raiser For Trump Claims Hack By Qatar
headline.main: A Top Trump Fund-Raiser Says Qatar Hacked His Email

docs.snippet: The Senate gave final passage to a bill to combat sex trafficking, disregarding concerns in Silicon Valley that it could chill internet content and harm free speech.

headline.print_headline: Sex Trafficking Bill Heads to Trump, Over Silicon Valley Concerns
headline.main: Sex Trafficking Bill Heads to Trump, Over Silicon Valley Concerns

docs.snippet: By alienating allies, the United States could undermine the potential for collective action among countries nursing shared grievances with China.

headline.print_headline: In Getting Tough on Chinese Trade, Trump Risks Alienating Allies
headline.main: Trump Says Getting Tough on Chinese Trade Will Empower the U.S. He Risks the Opposite.

docs.snippet: Voters who turned out for Donald Trump in 2016 appeared to turn on his chosen House candidate Tuesday, helping Conor Lamb, the Democrat, take a slight lead.

headline.main: Strong Performance by Democrat Conor Lamb in Pennsylvania Shakes Trump and G.O.P.
